title: 18- The Tenth Amendment
description: The Tenth Amendment limits the federal government’s control over the states, but the interpretation of that limit is always shifting.
author: roman@99pi.org (Roman Mars)
content:encoded: The Tenth Amendment limits the federal government’s control over the states, but the interpretation of that limit is always shifting.
